name: Belgian Federation of Food Supplements Industry
goal: NAREDI is the official point of contact for Belgian authorities and stakeholders in the food supplements industry. NAREDI defends the interests of the industry and informs its members and the consumer alike. At the European level, NAREDI is Board member of the European federation EHPM, the only official point of contact for the industry of food supplements for the European institutions. In this respect, NAREDI has an important impact on the lobbying process at the European level.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Sport
euInitiatives: Food supplements and all legislative implementation
